forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers early becoming a steady rain for the afternoon. High 12C. Winds ESE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain during the afternoon. High 54F. Winds ESE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain this evening. Showers continuing overnight. Thunder possible. Low 8C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers overnight. Thunder possible. Low 47F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%.
